resources.string: "Keeping up with security news will greatly aid you in gaining awareness of up to date vulnerabilities, technologies, products, and services. A range of resources are provided to help you keep up to date. \n"
"Stay Safe Online provide releases and highlights from the National Cyber Security Alliance's Media coverage.\n"
"All the latest news about cyber security from the BBC. \n"
"Infosecurity Magazine is the award winning online magazine dedicated to the strategy, insight and technology of information security. \n"
"View the various news topics provided by the National Cyber Security Centre \n"
